This is where the original error comes from. `VertNodeWeight`is suppose to take in the vertex index as it is declared in the collada file, passing `values[daeVertIndex]` is wrong causes an buffer overflow read.

I’m not sure how can I programmatically test this, the error results in wrong node weights being applied to some of the vertices and causes the animation to be distorted. Maybe we could try loading a collada under asan/valgrind or something similar to see the OOB errors.
